name: Papera
description:
A bird-themed platformer where you can't stop moving.

Controls (Keyboard):
AD or Left/Right arrows to move
Spacebar, W or Up arrow to jump
R or clicking the restart icon will restart the level
N or clicking the arrow icon to move to the next level  once finishedControls (Controller):
You control this like you would with any other platformer, just remember that L1 for restarting the level and R1 for going to the next level

Submitted to the Mini Jam 99 and made in three days!
You can play my other game jam game here

I also released the source code under the GPLv3 license, where can see my code on Day 1/2/3

Tools I used:
Godot as the game engine.
LibreSprite for pixel art,
GIMP for everything else about graphics,
sfxr for making the sounds,
JummBox for making the music.

Other platforms:
Youtube (expect to see a video in a few days), Itch.io profile, My Space
